title: where my camera has taken me
name: where my camera has taken me

properties.name: Adam's Mark Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomery 100 E 2nd St, Tulsa, OK, 74103where the crew of "path to stardom" stayed for the tractors shoot. the actual shoot was out of town quite a bit. we shot in their studio and on steve riley\'s dad\'s farm.

properties.name: Gruene Hall
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomery1281 Gruene Road, New Braunfels, TX, 78130we were here to tape david ball for "path to stardom". what a great place, texas\' oldest dance hall. Gruene Hall 830-606-1281

properties.name: Mobile Convention Center
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomery1 South Water Street, Mobile, AL, 36602the junior miss pageant, for tnn. oh my god was it humid! but the old town part was lovely. we were guests at a pre-event social. it was held at a private home (compound sort of thing).

properties.name: Ohr-O'Keefe Museum of Art
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomery Pleasant Reed House, Biloxi, MS, 39530one of the most interesting things about biloxi was learning about "the mad potter of biloxi, george ohr. he had flaming red hair and was reported to have tied himself to a tree on a barrier island to ride out a hurricane. he wanted to know how it would feel. Ohr-O\'Keefe Museum of Art 228-374-5547

properties.name: Oklahoma National Stockyards CO - Public Scales
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomery2501 Exchange Avenue Suite 107, Oklahoma City, OK, 73108i photographed bryan white and his grandfather at the auction. his grandfather was an auctioneer. they took us to cattleman\'s restaurant later and we had the best steaks ever.

properties.name: Walter Anderson Museum of Art
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomery 510 Washington Avenue, Ocean Springs, MS, 39564the museum was wonderful. such a great artist that i had never heard of. ocean springs was a beautiful small town with a LOT of money. downtown was full of exclusive shops and expensive restaurants.

properties.name: a great coffee and bagel place
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomery crested butte, coi wish i could remember the name of the place. it was filled with young adults getting ready to spend the day in the snow. i was shooting "country in the rockies" up on mt. crested butte, but we spent some time down in town.

properties.name: best hashbrowns
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomerysouth lake tahoe, cathe small hotel restaurant had the best hasbrowns i\'ve ever tasted. i think they had sour cream and chives in them. the first time i was in tahoe was to shoot tim mcgraw for "path to stardoom" on tnn. it was in august and the weather was great. we took the tram up to heavenly, then climbed up further to get him with the lake in the background.

properties.name: cowboy mural
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomerygillette, wyin this small town, big energy place there is very little of the old west left. but one reminder is a terrific painting of a cowboy\'s face on the side of a downtown building.

properties.name: crib lighthouse
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomerycrib lighthouse cheboygan, miearly one october morning i was waiting for the perfect sunrise. instead, i got the perfect pre-dawn clouds.

properties.name: kingsburg, ca
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomerykingsbury, cashooting ruff taff for "path to stardom" on tnn. we worked in a pecan grove, on the side of the mountain overlooking the town and in his family church. his whole family turned out and brought covered dishes to feed us.

properties.name: mission, tx
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomerymission, tx

properties.name: neal mccoy shoot
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomerylongview, txlongview is where neal grew up and where he still lives. i was shooting him for "path to stardom" on tnn. we spent most of the day at his house, but we did a spot at a shoe store he worked in and a club where he played.

properties.name: rapid city convention center
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomeryrapid city, sdi photographed a prca event here. i had some time before shooting so i made a side trip the mt. rushmore.

properties.name: red rock canyon, nv
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomeryred rocks, nvoutside of las vegas is a wonderful natural rock formation called red rocks. you can drive through the park, take hikes whatever you like. the cliffs are incredible. i made so many trips to vegas for tnn shoots i\'ve lost count.

properties.name: the lazy e arena
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomeryguthrie, okjust outside okc and owned by the gaylord family. the lazy e was home to a pbr event and the reba mcentire celebrity rodeo.

properties.name: the pink building
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomerycheyenne, wyalong the main drag in cheyenne, lincolnway, there is a huge pink building with white trim. it is home to a great western wear store.

properties.name: welcome to montana sign
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomerywyoming-montana linethe place is stopped to take a photo of myself with the sign. i drove on up to a little town that had a gas station/market, where i got some snacks. a postcard and a stamp. the mail drop box was across the street.

properties.name: wyoming state capitol
properties.description: Posted by Tmontgomerycheyenne, wya beautiful structure with a gold dome. the best part is the statue out from of ______. the city if full of outdoor sculputure.
